function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Human exposure to raccoon feces contaminated with Baylisascaris procyonis eggs","Impact":"Severe, often fatal neurologic disease in humans, particularly children","Mitigation":"Effective disinfection techniques to inactivate B. procyonis eggs","Technologies":"Biocides, heat treatment, desiccation, freezing","People":"General public, particularly children","Owner":"Public health authorities, pest control companies"},{"Description":"Lack of effective treatment for baylisascariasis","Impact":"Limited options for treating the disease","Mitigation":"Research and development of effective treatments for baylisascariasis","Technologies":"Medical research and development","People":"Patients with baylisascariasis","Owner":"Medical researchers, pharmaceutical companies"},{"Description":"Lack of information about survival of B. procyonis eggs and disinfection techniques","Impact":"Inadequate control of the disease transmission","Mitigation":"Research on survival of eggs and effective disinfection techniques, dissemination of information to the public","Technologies":"Laboratory research, public health education","People":"General public, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
